content.html: This is exactly what has led to this weird call of duty moment. The bad guy is called “El Sin Nombre” which translates as “The Nameless” which is really cool and badass. But I just keep picturing a peppy gerbil trying to teach me maths
content.value:
This is exactly what has led to this weird call of duty moment. The bad guy is called “El Sin Nombre” which translates as “The Nameless” which is really cool and badass. 

But I just keep picturing a peppy gerbil trying to teach me maths
